attributes.action: Hold a full, independent, public inquiry into the 2011 'UK Riots'
attributes.additional_details:
We call for a full, independent and public inquiry into the UK Riots, investigating each of the separate events, the causes of the disturbances and the underlying issues which may have contributed to the disorder.

It is important that lessons are learned from these events, to decrease the likelihood that they will be repeated and to increase public confidence in both Politics and Policing in our country.
